name: Microsoft Compound File Binary File Format, Version 3
extras: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><metadata><field name="disclosure">Is open format.</field><field name="filenameExtension"></field><field name="internetMediaType"></field><field name="pronomPUID"></field></metadata>
description: The Microsoft Compound File Binary File Format (CFB) file format is used for storing storage objects and stream objects in a hierarchical structure within a single file.
